text:
You are the Database Expert on team easyrent-complete. Your task is to COMPLETE all database schema work.

WORKING DIRECTORY: /home/sandriaas/_PROJECTS/easyrent/_apps/x-dashboard-0

TASK: Audit and fix database schema
1. Read packages/database/src/schema/*.ts to understand current schema
2. Check for missing columns that should exist (paymentTerms was just fixed in UI)
3. Verify all FK relationships are properly defined
4. Add missing indexes for query performance
5. Run: cd packages/database && npm run db:push

Key tables to audit:
- bookings, booking_line_items, booking_reservations
- vehicle_products, rental_products, shop_products
- vehicle_assets, customers, partners, staff
- incidents, payments, booking_addons

Also verify:
- packages/database/src/schema/relations.ts has all relationships
- packages/database/src/client.ts exports all needed utilities

Run migrations and verify the database is in sync:
cd packages/database && npm run db:push

DO NOT STOP until schema is complete and synced. Work autonomously.
